patthana24.12:4.1: Noāsavaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana24.12:5.1: Nanoāsavaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana24.12:6.1: Noāsavaṃ nahetuñca nanoāsavaṃ nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana24.12:6.4: Hetuyā pañca … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana24.12:7.1: Noāsavaṃ nanahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noāsavo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana24.12:8.1: Nanoāsavaṃ nanahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noāsavo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana24.12:9.1: Noāsavaṃ nanahetuñca nanoāsavaṃ nanahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca noāsavo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana24.12:9.4: Hetuyā pañca … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate pañca.
